reference.shortdesc: The dlhead element contains optional headings for the term and description columns in a definition list (dl). The definition list heading might contain a heading for the column of terms (dthd) and a heading for the column of descriptions (ddhd).

example.title: Example

fig.title: Definition list with a heading
fig.codeblock: <dl> <dlhead> <dthd>Image File View Selection</dthd> <ddhd>Resulting Information</ddhd> </dlhead> <dlentry> <dt>File Type</dt> <dd>Image's file extension</dd> </dlentry> <dlentry> <dt>Image Class</dt> <dd>Image is raster, vector, or 3D</dd> </dlentry> <dlentry> <dt>Number of pages</dt> <dd>Number of pages in the image</dd> </dlentry> <dlentry> <dt>Fonts</dt> <dd>Names of the fonts contained within a vector image</dd> </dlentry> </dl>

example.p: Rendering of definition lists will vary by application and by display format. Processors might render the second example as follows.

dlentry.dd: Number of pages in the image
Names of the fonts contained within a vector image
